bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: All types of excreted or secreted liquid, unclear items. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 50: 凡癰癤， 捻膿血不盡，而瘡口便合，其惡汁在里，雖瘥，終能更發，變成漏也 , “Whenever one fails to completely squeeze pus and blood from obstruction-illnesses and pimples, and the wound closes, malign sap will remain inside. Although [the abscess appears to have been] healed, it may eventually break open again and start leaking”.
